quoteText: Additionally, you shall not: (i) take any action that imposes or may impose (as determined by Pixel8Earth in its sole discretion) an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on Pixel8Earth's (or its third party providers') infrastructure.
title: Users can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much

tosdr.case: Users can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much
